lead_paragraph: Versatile back Pat Lambie will captain South Africa against the Barbarians at Wembley on Saturday, an audition for the role on a regular basis when Adriaan Strauss retires at the end of the season.

headline.print_headline: Rugby-Lambie to Captain Boks Against Barbarians
headline.main: Rugby-Lambie to Captain Boks Against Barbarians

snippet: Versatile back Pat Lambie will captain South Africa against the Barbarians at Wembley on Saturday, an audition for the role on a regular basis when Adriaan Strauss retires at the end of the season....
